CALICE::SaturationConstants

CALICE::SaturationConstants Class Reference

Class to store the parametrisation of the saturation curve (no error yet) for a certain chip/channel for a fixed moduleID. More...

Detailed Description

Class to store the parametrisation of the saturation curve (no error yet) for a certain chip/channel for a fixed moduleID.

S. Schmidt DESY
